Mbulaheni Group is a group holding company based in South Africa.

Our diversified investment portfolio spans a wide range of service lines with interests in key business sectors focused on innovation and plays an important role in strengthening South Africa’s opportunities for growth and development in private and public industries.

Our divisions operate in diverse sectors including information technology, construction, office supplies, security, and cleaning services.

The company establishment was in mid-summer of 2015 with a vision to build a supreme black-owned enterprise that will transform lives-hearts and serve customer needs in all seasons with willpower.

We combine the know-how to and local expertise of the South African-African geographical dynamics to connect quality products, to businesses, households and customers with our excellent customer service.

MG Cleaning Services

We offer total commercial cleaning and sanitation services.

MG Engineering 

We provide civil engineering solutions including enabling works, groundworks, infrastructure, Roads, bulk excavations, and land remediation and stabilisation.

MG Security

MG Security Services is a dynamic and innovative company committed to providing innovative security solutions to both our clients and candidates. Our company’s operations are on SA Standards, providing Security officers and mobile patrol services.
